name: Inertia (itch) (moneyfu)
description:
"If you have enough velocity, you can kill anything."
-Albert Einstein

"An object in motion something something motion something something speed velocity inertia something"
-Isaac Newton

An action-platformer game all about speed, and a very special shotgun.

you may need the latest version of java for this game to work. try downloading the latest version. https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp no promises can be made
